execution_summary: Built a Python 3.10 Docker image with pandas, numpy, pyreadr, statsmodels, and scipy. Created a new Python entrypoint (replicate_bflpe_memorization__py.py) per RUN POLICY to replace the missing script. Launched a container, verified the planned command, and executed it after approval. The script loaded PISA2012.replication.pkl (480,174 rows, 28 columns), identified variables (SCMAT as math self-concept, MEMOR as memorization, PV1MATH–PV5MATH as plausible values, SCHOOLID and CNT as school and country), computed school-average ability from PV mean, centered predictors, and fit school-level MixedLM models with country variance components fallback. Execution completed; MixedLM issued variance and Hessian warnings but produced estimates. The memorization × school-average ability interaction was positive and non-significant across all plausible values; the combined mean interaction was ~9.366. This does not support the preregistered hypothesis of a negative interaction.

code_executed.logs: Loaded dataset /app/data/PISA2012.replication.pkl (480174 x 28). Identified PVs: PV1MATH–PV5MATH; outcome: SCMAT; memorization: MEMOR; school: SCHOOLID; country: CNT. Fitted MixedLM per PV. Warnings: divide by zero in log/during variance component calculation; Hessian not positive definite. Saved /app/data/model_results.json and /app/data/model_summaries.txt. Per-PV interaction coefficients (memorization × school-average ability): PV1=9.3567 (SE=9.7668, p=0.3381); PV2=9.3656 (SE=9.7668, p=0.3376); PV3=9.3618 (SE=9.7669, p=0.3378); PV4=9.3755 (SE=9.7668, p=0.3371); PV5=9.3687 (SE=9.7668, p=0.3374). Combined mean interaction: 9.3657 (SD=0.0071).
code_executed.environment: Python 3.10 (Docker: python:3.10-slim) with pandas>=2.0, numpy>=1.24, pyreadr>=0.4.7, statsmodels>=0.14.0, scipy>=1.10, matplotlib>=3.7, pyyaml>=6.0

results.hypothesis_tested: In PISA 2012 data, the interaction between student-reported memorization strategies and school-average mathematics ability will be negative in its association with mathematics self-concept, controlling for individual mathematics ability and covariates (i.e., coefficient on memorization × school_average_math_ability < 0).

findings_summary.standard_error: Mean SE across PVs ≈ 9.7668; SD of coefficients ≈ 0.0071
findings_summary.statistical_significance: Not assessed for combined mean in this run

tables.table_description: Statsmodels MixedLM summaries for each plausible value including fixed effects, random effects, fit statistics, and warnings.
Structured outputs with per-PV interaction coefficients, SEs, p-values, and flags on variance components.
